original: Ahlin, Carl Christian Israel, major, Apelviksstrand, f. 23/12/86 i Ystad av kyrkoh. Zacharias A. o. Hedvig Ahlin. G. 21 m. Stel-la BartheJson. — Stud :ex. 05, off :ex. 07, intend:ex. 12, kansHex. 24. Und:löjtn. v. N. skånska inf:-reg. 07, löjtn. 12, und :intend. v. in-tend:kåren 13, kapt. 16, på överg:stat 28, major 41. Tjg. i olika intend :be-fattn., sekr. i ett ant. sakk :uppdr., e. tj :man i riksräkensk :verket, sysslom. v. kustsanat. Apelviken sed. 31. Skr.: Intendenturkårens historia 1880-1930 (30) samt ett flert. art. i dagspress o. facktidskr. RSO.
translated: Ahlin, Carl Christian Israel, Major, Apelviksstrand, born on December 23, 1886 in Ystad to Reverend Zacharias A. and Hedvig Ahlin. Married to Stella BartheJson on August 21. He passed his Studentexamen in 1905, became a military officer in 1907, an intendencia officer in 1912, and a kanslichef in 1924. He became a Second Lieutenant with the North Scanian Infantry Regiment in 1907, a Lieutenant in 1912, an intendencia lieutenant in the intendencia corps in 1913, a Captain in 1916, a higher official in 1928, and a Major in 1941. He served in various intendencia occupations, was a secretary in several investigative assignments, an official in the National Audit Office, and a harbor master in Apelviken since 1931. He authored "The History of the Intendencia Corps 1880-1930" (1930) along with several articles in newspapers and journals. He was a member of the Royal Swedish Academy of War Sciences.

affiliation.name: Royal Swedish Academy of War Sciences
